comments.comment:
Hi, we are currently trying to upgrade to 4.5.0 and experianced this issue. 
What options do we have? Is there any workaround?

When will 4.6.0 be released to fix this issue?
you can create the route policy factory beans yourself via java code and spring @bean so they are in use instead of auto-configuration. And auto configuration can also be turned off.

Get same problem on versions 4.5-4.8. Here simple example that solve my Micrometer problem.

 

@Bean
public CamelContextConfiguration camelContextConfiguration(PrometheusMeterRegistry meterRegistry) {
    return new CamelContextConfiguration() {
        @Override
        public void beforeApplicationStart(CamelContext camelContext) {
            var routePolicy = new MicrometerRoutePolicyFactory();
            routePolicy.setMeterRegistry(meterRegistry);
            routePolicy.setCamelContext(camelContext); //this line need for version 4.5 and above
            camelContext.addRoutePolicyFactory(routePolicy);
        }

        @Override
        public void afterApplicationStart(CamelContext camelContext) {

        }
    };
}
